Monty Hall

A fun little game in which you get to guess what number the computer is thinking.

Download as .zip Download as .tar.gz View on GitHub
Releases Project Home Site Home

Stable Releases

There are no releases because this was a fun and simple project and I never intend to modify the code again. For that very reason I never bothered to make a release. However, I did leave a .class file of the simulator located at https://github.com/bgbrandongomez/MontyHall/raw/master/MontyHall.class.
